description: Kahnav Properties' sophisticated website streamlines property transactions with advanced features. name: rust-raytracer
title: RayTracer in Rust
description: This high-performance raytracer, implemented in Rust, offers an intuitive scene description interface through well-designed classes. It boasts a comprehensive suite of advanced raytracing features, including soft shadows, Bounding Volume Hierarchy (BVH) for efficient rendering, and realistic motion blur effects. Leveraging Rust's speed and safety, this raytracer delivers stunning, photorealistic images with remarkable efficiency.

name: cpp-physics-engine
title: Physics Engine in C++
description: This high-performance physics engine, crafted in C++, delivers exceptional simulation capabilities. It provides a comprehensive set of classes, including RigidBodies and various Colliders, enabling developers to construct and simulate complex physical environments with ease. The engine's intuitive world-building interface, combined with its optimized C++ core, ensures rapid and accurate physics simulations for demanding applications.

name: pyrender
title: PyRender
description: This rendering engine, developed in Python, extended with C++, offers a straightforward solution for generating animated videos of specified scenes. While it is basic and primitive in its capabilities, it effectively outputs visual representations of animations, making it a useful tool for simple rendering tasks and introductory projects.
